# DBusMessageFilterFunction delegate

```csharp
public delegate IntPtr DBusMessageFilterFunction(IntPtr connection, IntPtr message, bool incoming, 
    IntPtr user_data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| connection | Transfer ownership: none |
| message | Transfer ownership: full |
| incoming | Transfer ownership: none |
| user_data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: full; Nullable: true
